ai-tha-ap360:1.3_0: a single person gives me the bed,
ai-tha-ap360:1.4_0: A person whom you swept away
ai-tha-ap360:2.4_0: they’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap360:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap360:3.4_0: as is the fruit for a cotton-down.
ai-tha-ap360:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Moggaliputta.
